title: Riven skin xd
body: Anyone know if there will be any new Riven skins coming out? I mean the last Riven skin was Arcade Riven in July 2015 and would really love some new ones :P

replies.body: last time i checked riven doesn't take skill xD

> [{quoted}](name=Wast3land ,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=2ZT7cENE,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-11-03T03:52:11.872+0000)
>
> lol, nice joke xd

theres no joke RIven is RIven xD
There is, you just don't see it, just like you don't see that Riven takes skill, find me any high elo player ( Plat +) that says Riven is a no skill/brainless champ and i'll gift you a skin
The skill is rolling your face on the keyboard for 20+ minutes without drooling all over your keys
Bitch you're level 12....wtf do you know about the champion let alone the game?? xD
But I see you haven't disagreed with me
No, i 100% disagree and my offer is still up, find anyone Plat or above that says Riven is unskilled/face roll and i'll gift you any skin you want
What do you think it is about riven for her not to be unskilled/face roll?
its because shes useless in higher elo in Bronze - Gold shes absolute god sent aha
Could you maybe word that sentence a bit better pls? Makes 0 sense
Says the guy from EU LUL :3
Nah Teemo need another skin before riven  ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
